00057 void DisplayOrbit()
00058 {
00059     if(myOrbit->IsIntegrateable())
00060         cout << "Orbit State (km, km/s): " << ~myOrbit->GetStateObject().GetStateRepresentation()->GetPositionVelocity() << endl;
00061     else
00062         cout << "Orbit State: [ uninitialized ]" << endl;
00063     return;
00064 }

00067 {

00069         cout << "Attitude State: (-, rad/s)" << ~myAttitude->GetStateObject().GetState() << endl;
00070     else
00071         cout << "Attitude State: [ uninitialized ]" << endl;
00072     return;

00076     if(myPropagator)
00077         cout << "Propagate times: [" << propTimes[0] << " -> " << propTimes[1] <<  "] (s)" << endl;
00078     else
00079         cout << "Propagate State: [ uninitialized ]" << endl;
00080     return;

00104 void Select()
00105 {
00106     switch(DisplayMenu())
00107     {
00108         case 1: // ChangeOrbit
00109             ChangeOrbit();
00110             break;
00111         case 2:
00112             ChangePropagator();
00113             //ChangeOrbitIntegrator();
00114             break;
00115         case 3: 
00116             ChangeAttitude();
00117             break;
00118         case 4:
00119             ChangePropagator();
00120             //ChangeAttitudeIntegrator();
00121             break;
00122         case 5:
00123             ChangeEnvironment();
00124             break;
00125         case 6:
00126             ChangePropagator();
00127             break;
00128         case 7:
00129             Propagate();
00130             break;
00131         case 8:
00132             ::Plot();
00133             break;
00134         case 0:
00135             return;
00136             break;
00137         default:
00138             cout << "Incorrect Selection." << endl;
00139             break;
00140     }
00141     Select();
00142 
00143 }

00165         if (myOrbit->IsIntegrateable())
00166         {
00167             cout << "Orbit State (km, km/s): " << ~myOrbit->GetHistoryObject().GetState(requestTime).GetStateRepresentation()->GetPositionVelocity() << endl;
00168             ofile.open("OrbitHistory.dat");
00169             ofile << setprecision(15) << myOrbit->GetHistoryObject().GetHistory();
00170             ofile.close();
00171         }
00172

00174         if (myAttitude->IsIntegrateable())
00175         {
00176             cout << "Attitude State: (-, rad/s)" << ~myAttitude->GetHistoryObject().GetState(requestTime).GetState() << endl;
00177 
00178             ofile.open("AttitudeHistory.dat");
00179             ofile << setprecision(15) << myAttitude->GetHistoryObject().GetHistory();
00180             ofile.close();
00181         }
00182     return 0;

00186 void Plot()
00187 {
00188     if(myOrbit)
00189         if (myOrbit->IsIntegrateable())
00190         {
00191             Matrix orbitHistory = myOrbit->GetHistoryObject().GetHistory();
00192             Matrix orbitPlotting = orbitHistory(_,_(MatrixIndexBase+1,MatrixIndexBase+3));
00193             Plot3D(orbitPlotting);
00194         }
00195     if(myAttitude)
00196         if (myAttitude->IsIntegrateable())
00197         {
00198             Matrix attitudeHistory = myAttitude->GetHistoryObject().GetHistory();
00199             Matrix attitudePlotting = attitudeHistory(_,_(MatrixIndexBase,MatrixIndexBase+4));
00200             Plot2D(attitudePlotting);
00201         }
00202 
00203 }

00205 void Propagate()
00206 {
00207 
00208     cout << "PropTime = " << propTimes[0].GetSeconds() << " s -> " << propTimes[1].GetSeconds() << " s" << endl;
00209     Vector orbInitState(6);
00210     Vector attInitState(7);
00211     if(myOrbit->IsIntegrateable())
00212     {
00213         orbInitState = myOrbit->GetStateObject().GetState();
00214         cout << "Orbit State: " << ~orbInitState << endl;
00215     }
00216     if(myAttitude->IsIntegrateable())
00217     {
00218         attInitState = myAttitude->GetStateObject().GetState();
00219         cout << "Attitude State: " << ~attInitState << endl;
00220     }
00221     // Integrate over the desired time interval
00222     tick();
00223     myPropagator->Propagate(propTimes, orbInitState, attInitState);
00224     ssfSeconds calcTime = tock();
00225     cout << "finished propagating in " << calcTime << " seconds." << endl;
00226 }

00230 void SetupEnvironment()
00231 {
00232     // ENVIRONMENT TESTING
00233     myEnvironment = new Environment;
00234     EarthCentralBody *pCBEarth = new EarthCentralBody;
00235     myEnvironment->SetCentralBody(pCBEarth);
00236 
00237     return;
00238 }
00239 void ChangeEnvironment()
00240 {
00241     // Add Gravity force function
00242     cout << "Filling Parameters" << endl;
00243     EnvFunction TwoBodyGravity(&GravityForceFunction);
00244     myEnvironment->AddForceFunction(TwoBodyGravity);
00245     
00246     cout << "Add Drag? (y or n): " << flush;
00247     char answer;
00248     cin >> answer;
00249     if(answer == 'y')
00250     {
00251         // Add Drag Force Function
00252         EnvFunction DragForce(&DragForceFunction);
00253         double *BC = new double(200);
00254         DragForce.AddParameter(reinterpret_cast<void*>(BC), 1);
00255         double *rho = new double(1.13 * pow(static_cast<double>(10), static_cast<double>(-12))); // kg/m^3
00256         DragForce.AddParameter(reinterpret_cast<void*>(rho), 2);
00257         myEnvironment->AddForceFunction(DragForce);
00258     }
00259     cout << "Finished Setting up Earth Environment" << endl;
00260 
00261     // Adds a controller
00262     
00263     EnvFunction Controller(&SimpleController);
00264     Vector* Gains = new Vector(3);
00265     cout << "Input Control gains: "<< flush;
00266     cin >> (*Gains)(1);
00267     cin >> (*Gains)(2);
00268     cin >> (*Gains)(3);
00269     
00270     Controller.AddParameter(reinterpret_cast<void*>(Gains),1);
00271     myEnvironment->AddTorqueFunction(Controller);    
00272     
00273     return;
00274 }

00279 void SetupPropagator()
00280 {
00281     myPropagator = new CombinedNumericPropagator;
00282     orbitIntegrator = new RungeKuttaFehlbergIntegrator;
00283     attitudeIntegrator = new RungeKuttaFehlbergIntegrator;
00284         
00285     myPropagator->SetOrbitIntegrator(orbitIntegrator);
00286     myPropagator->SetAttitudeIntegrator(attitudeIntegrator);
00287         
00288     // Integration Times
00289     double intTime = 1;
00290     ssfTime begin(0);
00291     ssfTime end(begin + intTime);
00292     propTimes.push_back(begin);
00293     propTimes.push_back(end);
00294     return;
00295 }
00296 
00297 void ChangePropagator()
00298 {
00299     DisplayPropagator();
00300     
00301     // Create & setup the integator
00302         // Setup an integrator and any special parameters
00303     int stepSize = 1;
00304 
00305     // Integration Times
00306     double intTime = 1;
00307     cout << "Integration duration (s): " << flush;
00308     cin >> intTime;
00309       /*
00310     cout << "Orbit Integration Stepsize (s): "<< flush;
00311     cin >> stepSize;
00312     orbitIntegrator->SetNumSteps(floor(intTime/stepSize));
00313 
00314     cout << "Attitude Integration Stepsize(s): "<< flush;
00315     cin >> stepSize;
00316     attitudeIntegrator->SetNumSteps(floor(intTime/stepSize));
00317     */
00318     double tolerance;
00319     orbitIntegrator->SetStepSizes(1, 300);
00320     cout << "Orbit Tolerance: " << flush;
00321     cin >> tolerance;
00322     orbitIntegrator->SetTolerance(tolerance);
00323     attitudeIntegrator->SetStepSizes(0.01, 5);
00324     cout << "Attitude Tolerance: " << flush;
00325     cin >> tolerance;
00326     attitudeIntegrator->SetTolerance(tolerance);
00327     ssfTime begin(0);
00328     ssfTime end(begin + intTime);
00329     propTimes[0] = begin;
00330     propTimes[1] = end;
00331 }

00335 void myOrbitStateConvFunc(const Matrix &_meshPoint, OrbitState &_convertedOrbitState)
00336 {
00337     static Vector tempVector(_meshPoint[MatrixColsIndex].getIndexBound() - 1);
00338     tempVector(_) = ~_meshPoint(_,_(MatrixIndexBase+1, _meshPoint[MatrixColsIndex].getIndexBound()));
00339     _convertedOrbitState.SetState(tempVector);
00340     return;
00341 }

00343 void ChangeOrbit()
00344 {
00345     DisplayOrbit();
00346     
00347     // Create & initialize the orbit
00348     OrbitState myOrbitState;
00349     myOrbitState.SetStateRepresentation(new PositionVelocity);
00350     myOrbitState.SetOrbitFrame(new OrbitFrameIJK);
00351     Vector initPV(6);
00352     //-5776.6 -157 3496.9
00353     // -2.595 -5.651 -4.513
00354         cout << "Enter the position vector (km): " << flush;
00355         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+0); // km
00356         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+1); // km
00357         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+2); // km
00358         cout << "Enter the velocity vector (km): " << flush;
00359         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+3); // km
00360         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+4); // km
00361         cin >> initPV(VectorIndexBase+5); // km
00362     myOrbitState.SetState(initPV);
00363     myOrbit->SetStateObject(myOrbitState);
00364     
00365 //    cout << "Choose the dynamics equation: " << flush;
00366     myOrbit->SetDynamicsEq(&TwoBodyDynamics);
00367     myOrbit->SetStateConversion(&myOrbitStateConvFunc);
00368 
00369     // Setup Parameters (ie mass, etc)
00370     return;
00371 }

00375     return;

00379 // *************************
00380 // ******* ATTITUDE ******** 
00381 // ************************* 
00382 void myAttitudeStateConvFunc(const Matrix &_meshPoint, AttitudeState &_convertedAttitudeState)
00383 {
00384     static Vector tempQ(4); tempQ(_) = ~_meshPoint(_,_(2, 5));
00385     static Vector tempVector(3); tempVector(_) = ~_meshPoint(_, _(6, 8));
00386     _convertedAttitudeState.SetState(Rotation(Quaternion(tempQ)), tempVector);
00387     return;
00388 }
00389 static Vector AttituteDynamics(const ssfTime &_time, const Vector& _integratingState, Orbit *_Orbit, Attitude *_Attitude, const Matrix &_parameters, const Functor &_forceFunctorPtr)
00390 {
00391     static Vector stateDot(7);
00392     static Matrix bMOI(3,3); 
00393     static Matrix qtemp(4,3); 
00394     static Vector Tmoment(3);
00395     static Vector qIn(4); 
00396     static Vector wIn(3);
00397 
00398     qIn = _integratingState(_(VectorIndexBase,VectorIndexBase + 3));
00399     wIn = _integratingState(_(VectorIndexBase + 4,VectorIndexBase + 6));
00400     qIn /= norm2(qIn);
00401 
00402     qtemp(_(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2),_) = skew(qIn(_(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2))) + qIn(VectorIndexBase+3) * eye(3);
00403     qtemp(VectorIndexBase+3, _) = -(~qIn(_(VectorIndexBase+0,VectorIndexBase+2)));
00404 
00405     bMOI = _parameters(_(MatrixIndexBase+0,MatrixIndexBase+2),_(MatrixIndexBase+0,MatrixIndexBase+2));
00406     Tmoment = _forceFunctorPtr.Call(_time, _Orbit->GetStateObject(), _Attitude->GetStateObject());
00407     
00408     stateDot(_(VectorIndexBase,VectorIndexBase + 3)) = 0.5 * qtemp * wIn;
00409     stateDot(_(VectorIndexBase + 4,VectorIndexBase + 6)) = (bMOI.inverse() * (Tmoment - skew(wIn) * (bMOI * wIn)));
00410 
00411     return stateDot;
00412 }

00414 void ChangeAttitude()
00415 {
00416     DisplayAttitude();
00417     double q1,q2,q3,q4;
00418     cout << "Enter Attitude quaternion: " << flush;
00419     cin >> q1 >> q2 >> q3 >> q4;
00420     
00421     AttitudeState myAttitudeState;
00422     myAttitudeState.SetRotation(Rotation(Quaternion(q1,q2,q3,q4)));
00423 
00424     cout << "Enter Attitude angular velocity (rad/s): " << flush;
00425     cin >> q1 >> q2 >> q3;
00426     Vector initAngVelVector(3);
00427         initAngVelVector(1) = q1;
00428         initAngVelVector(2) = q2;
00429         initAngVelVector(3) = q3;
00430         
00431     myAttitudeState.SetAngularVelocity(initAngVelVector);
00432 
00433     myAttitude->SetStateObject(myAttitudeState);
00434     myAttitude->SetDynamicsEq(&AttituteDynamics);
00435     myAttitude->SetStateConversion(&myAttitudeStateConvFunc);
00436     cout << "Enter Principle Moments of Inertia: " << flush;
00437     Matrix MOI = eye(3);
00438     cin >> MOI(1,1);
00439     cin >> MOI(2,2);
00440     cin >> MOI(3,3);
00441     myAttitude->SetParameters(MOI);
00442     
00443     return;
00444 }
00445 void SetupAttitude()
00446 {
00447     myAttitude = new Attitude;
00448     
00449     return;
00450     
00451 }
00452 Vector SimpleController(const ssfTime &_currentTime, const OrbitState &_currentOrbitState, const AttitudeState &_currentAttitudeState, const EnvFuncParamaterType &_parameterList)
00453 {
00454     static Vector Torques(3);
00455     Torques(1) = (*reinterpret_cast<Vector*>(_parameterList[0]))(1) * sin(_currentTime.GetSeconds());
00456     Torques(2) = (*reinterpret_cast<Vector*>(_parameterList[0]))(2) * cos(_currentTime.GetSeconds());
00457     Torques(3) = (*reinterpret_cast<Vector*>(_parameterList[0]))(3);
00458     return Torques;
00459 }
